DOC.brief_summary: This randomize research trial study Community-based Health Information Technology ( HIT ) Tools Cancer Screening Health Insurance Promotion ( CATCH-UP ) intervention increase cancer screen prevention care uninsured patient community health center . The CATCH-UP intervention may contribute increase rate insurance coverage , lead improved cancer screen prevention rate community health care setting , general recommend preventive care .
DOC.brief_title: CATCH-UP Intervention Increasing Cancer Screening Prevention Care Uninsured Patients Community Health Centers
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate effect CATCH-UP intervention up-to-date status cancer screen preventive care receive patient . II . Evaluate effect CATCH-UP intervention patient ' insurance coverage rate . III . Evaluate intervention implementation process , patient community health center ( CHC ) staff acceptance use CATCH-UP tool , patient- , provider- , system-level factor associate successful implementation sustainability tool , use mixed method . OUTLINE : CHC clinic randomize 1 2 group . We compare group matched-comparison group . GROUP I ( INTERVENTION ARM 1 ) : Participants receive CATCH-UP tool include panel management/data aggregator system identify patient may eligible public coverage yet insure , near coverage expiration , couple automate patient outreach communication baseline . GROUP II ( INTERVENTION ARM 2 ) : Participants receive CATCH-UP tool include panel management/data aggregator system identify patient may eligible public coverage yet insure , near coverage expiration , couple automate patient outreach communication . Participants also receive additional implementation support training , assistance workflow , practice facilitation . Matched-comparison group : A clinic-level matched comparison group derive OCHIN membership use propensity score match technique . Comparison group clinic participate actively study activity , part member business associate agreement OCHIN , already agree provide data OCHIN pre- post-implementation analysis study .
DOC.criteria: Established patient CHC sit Lowincome Ethnically diverse population low rate cancer screening compare national rate Uninsured patient Patients 18 64 year age Clinics must primary care site , great 1,000 adult patient past year , locate state expand Medicaid , implement OCHIN EHR prior January 1 , 2013
